name: Bush Air
about: Bush Air is a specialized flying school focused on advanced backcountry, mountain, canyon, STOL, off-airport, and tailwheel flight training. Located at Kidwell Airport in Cal Nev Ari, Nevada, the school is led by Certified Flight Instructor Milne "CC" Pocock. Our comprehensive training programs equip pilots with the skills necessary to operate in challenging environments, emphasizing safety, decision-making, and exceptional flying techniques. We offer a range of courses, including practical flight training and theoretical knowledge sessions, ensuring pilots are well-prepared for the unique demands of bush flying. With a strong emphasis on safety and proficiency, Bush Air has earned a reputation for producing highly skilled and confident pilots. Our training is designed to enhance your flying skills and prepare you for the adventures of backcountry flying.
